    Beta-binomial mixture model log-likelihood derivatives to its parameters involved in optimization

    BetaBinomMix_LLDeriv_transfo.Rd

    BetaBinomMix_LLDeriv Lorem ipsum

    BetaBinomMix_LLDeriv_transfo(
  ref_counts,
  var_counts,
  probshift,
  SE,
  prr,
  pvv,
  prv,
  theta_hom,
  theta_het,
  Der1,
  Der2 = NULL
)

    Arguments

    ref_counts

    Number or Numeric vector Reference count(s).

    var_counts

    Number or Numeric vector. Variant count(s).

    probshift

    Number. The reference allele fraction in heterozygotes, indicating allelic bias when deviating from 0.5

    SE

    Number. Sequencing error rate.

    prr

    Number. Reference homozygote genotype probability of the locus.

    pvv

    Number. Variant homozygote genotype probability of the locus.

    prv

    Number. Heterozygote genotype probability of the locus.

    theta_hom

    Number. The dispersion parameter of the homozygous peaks.

    Der1

    String. Derivate with respect to this parameter.

    Der2

    String. Derivate with respect to this parameter as well; optional.

    isCase

    Number or Numeric vector. Equals 1 for cases and 0 for controls.

    Value

    A log-likelihood derivative

    Contents

    Developed by Cedric Stroobandt.
